text: Levent Eriş (born 17 September 1962) is a retired Turkish football midfielder and later manager.Footballdatabase ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish footballers Category:İzmirspor footballers Category:Samsunspor footballers Category:Alanyaspor footballers Category:Bucaspor footballers Category:Karşıyaka S.K. footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Turkey under-21 international footballers Category:Turkish football managers Category:İzmirspor managers Category:Manisaspor managers Category:Kayseri Erciyesspor managers Category:Altay S.K. managers Category:Diyarbakırspor managers Category:Samsunspor managers Category:Adana Demirspor managers Category:Giresunspor managers Category:Boluspor managers Category:Adanaspor managers
